channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【November 2025 Insiders (version 1.107)】2025 年 11 月 Insider（版本 1.107）
item.description: 【Learn what is new in the Visual Studio Code November 2025 Release (1.107). Read the full article】了解 Visual Studio Code 2025 年 11 月版本 (1.107) 中的新增功能。阅读全文

item.title: 【Announcing Azure DevOps Server General Availability】宣布 Azure DevOps 服务器全面可用
item.description: 【We’re thrilled to announce that Azure DevOps Server is now generally available (GA)! This release marks the transition from the Release Candidate (RC) phase to full production readiness, delivering enterprise-grade DevOps capabilities fo】我们很高兴地宣布 Azure DevOps Server 现已全面可用 (GA)！此版本标志着从发布候选 (RC) 阶段到全面生产准备阶段的过渡，为企业提供企业级 DevOps 功能

item.title: 【.NET and .NET Framework December 2025 servicing releases updates】.NET 和 .NET Framework 2025 年 12 月服务版本更新
item.description: 【Welcome to our combined .NET servicing updates for December 2025. Let's get into the latest release of .NET & .NET Framework, here is a quick overview of what's new in our servicing releases: Update Overview .NET and .NET Framework has been refreshed with the latest update as of December 09, 2025. This update contains non-securi】欢迎使用我们 2025 年 12 月的组合 .NET 服务更新。让我们了解最新版本的 .NET 和 .NET Framework，以下是我们服务版本中的新增功能的快速概述：更新概述 .NET 和 .NET Framework 已使用截至 2025 年 12 月 9 日的最新更新进行了刷新。此更新包含非安全内容

item.title: 【Blue-green deployment in Azure Container Apps using Azure Developer CLI】使用 Azure 开发人员 CLI 在 Azure 容器应用程序中进行蓝绿部署
item.description: 【Blue-green deployment in Azure Container Apps using Azure Developer CLI If you follow the Azure Developer CLI blog posts, you already know that Azure Container Apps (ACA) support in Azure Developer CLI (azd) is GA. We want azd to be production-ready—you should be a】使用 Azure 开发人员 CLI 在 Azure 容器应用中进行蓝绿部署 如果您关注 Azure 开发人员 CLI 博客文章，您已经知道 Azure 开发人员 CLI (azd) 中的 Azure 容器应用 (ACA) 支持已正式发布。我们希望 azd 做好生产准备——您应该是

item.title: 【Implementing Cross-Platform In-App Billing in .NET MAUI Applications】在 .NET MAUI 应用程序中实现跨平台应用内计费
item.description: 【With the discontinuation of the popular InAppBillingPlugin, many .NET MAUI developers have been looking for guidance on implementing in-app purchases in their applications. Today, we're sharing a comprehensive sample that demonstrates how to implement cross-platform billing】随着流行的 InAppBillingPlugin 的停止，许多 .NET MAUI 开发人员一直在寻找有关在其应用程序中实现应用内购买的指导。今天，我们分享一个全面的示例，演示如何实现跨平台计费

item.title: 【Previewing the JavaScript/TypeScript Modernizer for VS Code Insiders】为 VS Code Insider 预览 JavaScript/TypeScript Modernizer
item.description: 【Previewing the JavaScript/TypeScript Modernizer for VS Code Insiders Keeping JavaScript/TypeScript projects up-to-date can be a challenge, especially when it’s time to upgrade a bunch of npm packages or adopt the latest frameworks. We’ve heard from many JS/TS developers that modernizing an older app (upgrading de】为 VS Code Insider 预览 JavaScript/TypeScript Modernizer 保持 JavaScript/TypeScript 项目最新可能是一项挑战，特别是当需要升级一堆 npm 包或采用最新框架时。我们从许多 JS/TS 开发人员那里听说，对旧应用程序进行现代化改造（升级 de

item.title: 【How does Windows synthesize CF_UNICODE­TEXT from CF_TEXT and vice versa?】Windows 如何从 CF_TEXT 合成 CF_UNICODETEXT，反之亦然？
item.description: 【Last time, we started our exploration of how Windows synthesizes text clipboard formats by looking at the conversion between CF_OEM­TEXT and CF_TEXT】上次，我们通过查看 CF_OEMTEXT 和 CF_TEXT 之间的转换来开始探索 Windows 如何合成文本剪贴板格式

item.title: 【Announcing Microsoft Entra PowerShell v1.1.0】宣布推出 Microsoft Entra PowerShell v1.1.0
item.description: 【We’re thrilled to introduce Microsoft Entra PowerShell v1.1.0 available on PowerShell Gallery. The headline feature is No more version pinning to Microsoft Graph PowerShell v2.25.0. You can now use the latest Graph modules wi】我们很高兴在 PowerShell Gallery 上推出 Microsoft Entra PowerShell v1.1.0。标题功能是不再有版本固定到 Microsoft Graph PowerShell v2.25.0。您现在可以使用最新的图形模块

item.title: 【Entra PowerShell Now Supports Latest Microsoft Graph PowerShell Versions】Entra PowerShell 现在支持最新的 Microsoft Graph PowerShell 版本
item.description: 【We’ve heard you and we’ve made it happen! One of the most requested changes from our community has been greater flexibility when working with Microsoft Graph PowerShell. Previously, Entra PowerShell pinned its dependency to Microsoft Graph PowerShell v2.25, which limited customers from leveraging】我们听到了您的声音，我们已经实现了这一目标！我们社区最需要的更改之一是使用 Microsoft Graph PowerShell 时具有更大的灵活性。此前，Entra PowerShell 将其依赖关系固定为 Microsoft Graph PowerShell v2.25，这限制了客户利用

item.title: 【Long-term data retention up to 10 years: Announcing Private Preview of Azure Backup for Azure Cosmos DB】数据长期保留长达 10 年：宣布推出 Azure Cosmos DB 备份专用预览版
item.description: 【Azure Backup for Azure Cosmos DB is a new option that lets you securely protect and recover your Azure Cosmos DB data for compliance, audit, and ransomware protection scenarios. It leverages Azure Backup’s vault isolation and Azure Cosmos DB’s native backup streams to deliver scalable, long-term data protection that meets regulatory requir】适用于 Azure Cosmos DB 的 Azure 备份是一个新选项，可让你安全地保护和恢复 Azure Cosmos DB 数据，以实现合规性、审核和勒索软件保护方案。它利用 Azure Backup 的保管库隔离和 Azure Cosmos DB 的本机备份流来提供满足监管要求的可扩展的长期数据保护
